title: April Fools Better Idea!
body: I really wish Riot would have had URF this April fools again but for some reason didn't. Also, I think they should do a April fools mode where is makes champions abilities crazy OP Like they did in DOOM BOTS OF DOOM!!!

replies.body: They need to release URF once a year at least (4/1) then release AR-URF in rotate game mode like they do *sometimes*
